content: Hello everyone! I hope you can help me. I would like to know if it is possible to delete the files located in /payara5/glassfish/domains/domain1/files/temp, or if those files are the ones that are in the datasets that have not yet been published? Thanks!
Hmm, @Don Sizemore suggested adding that temp directory to systemd-tmpfiles config: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/10667#issuecomment-2299004811

There's a related issue here:

Documentation: Document various temp directories used by Dataverse #2848
